data.title: allow to use custom shader uniforms and attributes on drawNode
V3 bugfix label shadow bug
data.body: fix label shadow bug.

data.title: fix ui::WebView callback operate OpenGL issue.
data.body:
All the OpenGL operations should be in OpenGL thread.
This PR wraps the callbacks in OpenGL thread.

data.title: iOS Splash Screens and iOS Icons Not Configured Properly
data.body:
It looks like the Cocos2d-x 3.8.1 iOS template (and previous 3.x versions) uses a configuration for iOS splash screens and a few icons that was not configured properly. 

To fix the issue, I deleted the UILaunchImages array of dictionaries in the Info.plist and ensure the following files are added as resources to the iOS project.

Default-568h@2x.png
Default-667h@2x.png
Default-736h@3x.png
Default.png
Default@2x.png
Default-Landscape~ipad.png

Another issue is that the orientation of the Default-736h@3x.png image is supposed to be portrait, but it is landscape in the helloWorld template. This might mislead developers to create the image with the wrong orientation.

I also had issues when using the icons defined in the template to submit the app with a missing icon or misconfigured Info.plist. The app failed validation due to an icon issue. I forget exactly what the issue was. But I updated the icons to more explicitly show the sizes in the file names and updated the Info.plist as describe in this blogpost in the section titled Icons and Splash Screens: http://heyalda.com/18-things-every-cocos2d-x-c-game-developer-should-know-about-xcode/

I am not certain this is the "correct" way to configure the assets. Could not get the asset catalog approach to work, but the approach descried in the blog post seems to show the splash screens and icons properly when using iOS and I tested it on 6plus, 6, 4s, 4, 5, iPad mini, and iPad 3 and it all looked correct.

I also just tested this in the simulator using base SDK iOS 9 and Xcode 7 and it looks correct on each device.

data.title: Wrong enabling of scale9 background in ccui.Layout
EditBox PlaceHolder hint before start enter text
data.body:
![img](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/12607219/10019870/7a6885fc-6148-11e5-93fe-f8b2076aa996.png)
v 3.8.1, IOS
1. i user black background color for EditBox
2. focus the EditBox (apair Keyboard, but not start tape text, pointer its blinking on start of the text field)
3. !!! place holder hint color it's any time black transparent, and invisible on black background !!!

how to set color for placeholder hint

data.title: Fix crash (integer overflow) in Device::getTextureDataForText (ios)
data.body:
## Explanation

There was the problem when _height_ and _width_ were typecast to **short**
integer. So for values bigger than **sizeof(short)** we had integer overflow. Values may became negative.
## Steps to reproduce:

Create simple application with **cocos2d::ui::EditBox**. Start it. Add 1000 (just
example) characters at a time to the edit box. Method
**Device::getTextureDataForText** will be called and there will be integer
overflow for _height_ and/or _width_:

![screen shot 2015-09-22 at 16 00 34](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/2412624/10018995/5a5575ea-6143-11e5-8235-793aefeb3fa6.png)
As a result application will crash later.
## Notes

This fix is related to platform (IOS) dependent code! So it is in _CCDevice-ios.mm_.

data.title: Windows / Code IDE 1.2: Reload Issue
data.body:
Hi all:

We are using Cocos Code IDE 1.2 only for Remote Debugging and Code Live now.

Here is our issue resume:
- **Platform**: Windows 10
- **Cocos2d-x**: 3.8 JS
- **Project creation**: `cocos new runtimeTest -l js -t runtime`
- **Runtime apk creation** (simulator): `cocos compile -p android -m debug --ap android-10 -j 3 --no-res`
- **Device**: Android 5.1
- **Cocos Code IDE**: 1.2.0
- Success case:
  1. Launch APK using Android ADB Mode OR Remote Debugging
  2. All (js + resources) are loaded corretly
  3. Game always starts OK
- **Failure case A**: From previous success case:
  1. Modify src/app.js
  2. src/app.js is reloaded
  3. Then game always crashes. Here is the catlog output:


data.title: fix typos
data.body:
fix typos and syntax errors.
I use  Visual Studio editor extension VSSpellChecker to do a thorough check, the VSSpellChecker project is hosted here https://github.com/EWSoftware/VSSpellChecker

data.title: Bug fix for js-test and cpp-test
data.body:
Fix when click "remove ui" in "native test-JSBExtendTest" under project js-test will crash the program.
Fix "Node:ui -> GUI Dynamic Create Test -> Slider Test" under project cpp-test when click slider bar the slider button moved but won't refresh percentage value.
Fix in "Scheduler->Scheduler ttimeScale Test" when drag slider to left then click the middle of slider bar and drag slider button to right may raise crash.

data.title: clone Text will miss the outline setting
Its recommended that developers should add md5/sha1 sum in releases
data.body:
It proves that unity and cocos2d-x are in danger of being infected by xcodeghost.
http://www.digi-wo.com/thread-34634-1-1.html

data.title: V3 Win10 UWP fixes
data.body: This pull request adds the missing CCMotionStreak3D files. Re-added all Physics and 3D files to Win10 UWP libcocos2d project files to make sure all files are correct.

data.title: V3 Win10 UWP fixes
data.body: This pull request fixes the broken v3 Win10 UWP build by removing CCComponentPhysics2d files from the libcocos2d project.

data.title: Add script component for attaching script as component of Nodes
Fix crash in destructor of FontFreeType
data.body:
Crash happens if:
- create a label with ttf font
- destroy Director (it calls FontFreeType::shutdownFreeType)
- destroy the label

data.title: Extend API of TextField
data.body:
Added extended methods to TextField:
- getStringNumLines
- getLineHeight
- setLineBreakWithoutSpace

data.title: CONTRIBUTE link was wrong on line 286
data.body: CONTRIBUTE link was wrong on line 286, fixed.

data.title: Pls add more 3D effect showcas in cpp-test project.
Should Node::getName() return the string by reference?
Update CCMenu.cpp
data.body: I think if the menu in 2D view, it only be triggered by 2D camera. 3D is also the same.

data.title: The menuitem be selected but I don't touch it.
Fix js-template-default compile error.
data.body: related issue: https://github.com/cocos2d/cocos2d-x/issues/13694

data.title: Set orientation portrait
data.body:
I use cocos2dx-3.6, Lua project, I want to change the default orientation landscape of Android to portrait.

Modified frameworks/runtime-src/proj.android/AndroidManifest.xml:

```
<activity android:name="org.cocos2dx.lua.AppActivity"
                  android:label="@string/app_name"
                  android:screenOrientation="portrait"
                  android:theme="@android:style/Theme.NoTitleBar.Fullscreen"
                  android:configChanges="orientation">
```

But it seems did not take effect.
